data.title: THE FINAL JAM
data.meta_description: Mitchie Torres can’t wait to return to Camp Rock so that she and rock star Shane Gray can spend the summer making music and having fun with their friends. But when Mitchie arrives, she discovers that Camp Star, a slick new camp across the lake, has lured many campers and instructors away,...
data.text:
Paul Hoen

He studied Drama, Film and Television at the University of Santa Clara, California. Since 1987 he has directed many Disney Channel films for children, such as TRU CONFESSIONS (2002), YOU WISH! (2003), EDDIE’S MILLION DOLLAR COOK-OFF (2003), READ IT AND WEEP (2006), JUMP IN! (2007), CHEETA GIRLS: ONE WORLD (2008), DADNAPPED (2009). Popular series directed by Hoen include THE SECRET WORLD OF ALEX MACK, SABRINA THE TEENAGE WITCH, THE JERSEY, NED’S DECLASSIFIED SCHOOL SURVIVAL GUIDE, SOUTH OF NOWHERE, BEYOND THE BREAK.
